item.description:
EVENT: Dinner followed by a lesson and latin dancing at Temporada Latina â€“ the premier latin night in Boston, with plenty of Salsa, Merengue and Bachata, at RYLES JAZZ CLUB, 2nd flr. 212 Hampshire
Street, Inman Square, Cambridge, MA. There is a beginner's dance lesson from 8:45 - 10 pm
and then the full night of dancing begins at 10 pm and goes all the way to 12:00.

Questions & RSVP: Email the trip's coordinator, Ruth Gold (gold_ruthellen@yahoo.com) by Tues, March 16.
Meet: For those who want to get together for dinner, please arrive at Ryles at 7:00 P.M.
For just the lesson & dancing, arrive at Ryle's at 8:30PM.
Cost: $ for dinner, discounted price of $8.00 includes lesson and dancing, plus $5 for guests.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: DINNER AND LATIN DANCING
